metadata.title: USN-4986-1 -- rpcbind vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that rpcbind incorrectly handled certain large data sizes. A remote attacker could use this issue to cause rpcbind to consume resources, leading to a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4986-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  rpcbind - 0.2.3-0.6ubuntu0.18.04.2 No subscription required
